1.title: The Impossible is Possible
1.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes a young man who pledges to walk again after a tragic car accident has left him in a wheelchair, a couple who has suffered through 15 years of infertility, a Deaf Veteran longing to hear her children, a middle aged housewife aspiring to be a body builder, and a man willing to give his fiancée his own kidney for her life saving transplant so they can live happily ever after.

2.title: Family Is Our Superpower
2.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes people who make a commitment to complete a life changing, yearlong goal whose results the audience will see instantly.

3.title: My Outside Matches My Inside
3.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes people who make a commitment to complete a life changing, yearlong goal whose results the audience will see instantly.

4.title: No Pain, No Gain
4.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes people who make a commitment to complete a life-changing, yearlong goal whose results the audience will see instantly. A former police cadet hoping to regain his ability to walk, a woman hoping to lose over 50 pounds, a man whose protruding ears have negatively impacted his life, a mom with six daughters putting their life savings into opening a cupcake company, and a woman eager to honor her father's memory by completely making over her physicality and participating in a body building competition.

5.title: New Year, New Me
5.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes people who make a commitment to complete a life-changing, yearlong goal whose results the audience will see instantly. Tonight, a woman with an amputated foot pledges to complete a triathlon. A young woman struggling with obesity who wants to lose 100 pounds and wear a bikini for the first time, a blind girl yearning for a seeing eye dog to help her navigate the world, a nurse who wants her own plastic surgery to make her feel more confident, and a couple who has suffered a painful history and want to rebuild their family.

6.title: Dudes from Different Latitudes
6.plot: Host Cat Deely welcomes people who make a commitment to complete a life-changing, yearlong goal whose results the audience will see instantly. Tonight, a mother/daughter who want to hike the Appalachian trail after the daughter hopefully gets a successful kidney transplant, an obese young woman who hopes to lose 100 pounds, a woman who wants to write a book to tell her father's life story as a tribute to him before he passes, a man searching for his doppelganger and a former football hero who hopes to regain the ability to walk.

imdb.plot outline: The show follows different people each week who have vowed to make extreme changes in their lives over a 12 month. From weight loss to adopting a child or getting a seeing eye dog, the guests come on the show, and discuss their "resolutions" and then, as if it were magic, they appear 12 months later to show us whether or not they accomplished their goals.
imdb.title: This Time Next Year
plot: The show follows different people each week who have vowed to make extreme changes in their lives over a 12 month. From weight loss to adopting a child or getting a seeing eye dog, the guests come on the show, and discuss their "resolutions" and then, as if it were magic, they appear 12 months later to show us whether or not they accomplished their goals.::Chantel
